sentences.english: Connect this part to the machine.

sentences.chinese: 并结合工厂管卡零件进行了铸造工艺辅助设计。

sentences.english: We can conform the levelness of the machine by means of shim and screw jack.

sentences.english: As a result, it can decrease production routine and reduce production costs, which will lay foundations for practical research on parts such as crank axle.
sentences.chinese: 本研究为曲轴等非调质钢零件的实用性研究提供参考。

sentences.chinese: 也适于大型盘状零件外圆面的深层硬化。

sentences.english: Make? C designs that allow easy, cost-effective disassembly and re-use of parts at end of life.
sentences.chinese: 低成本，容易拆解，在生命周期结束零件可重新利用。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a tool for measuring internal thread depth of mechanical parts.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及机械零件的内螺纹深度测量工具。

sentences.english: The chuck, in a sealed construction, may work for long life with wear-resistant parts.
sentences.chinese: 卡盘结构封闭式，零件耐磨损，使用寿命长。

sentences.english: A semi-intelligent process ing drawing generation system for3dimensional parts is introduced.

sentences.english: Calculate the product of each "parts" the cost of material price.

sentences.english: The warranty covers all power-train components.
